feature.label: djUnit plugin for Eclipse 4.7.x
feature.description: 0.9.0 [2021/03/05] - ASM 3.x, 2.x and 1.5 removed. - Repackaged ASM 5.x, 9.x. included. - java8 and java11 supported.
